ygData.subject: Re: Getting our Concerns Noticed
ygData.msgSnippet: but your pet will do aditional damage, and give ya three steps for the zone when things get bad... I personally think sk is one of the best classes as is...
ygData.messageBody:
but your pet will do aditional damage, and give ya three steps for the zone
when things get bad...
I personally think sk is one of the best classes as is...
----- Original Message -----
From: Brian Hook <bwh@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 5:09 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Getting our Concerns Noticed


> From: bwh@... (Brian Hook)
>
> >But, I would like to know others opinions on how we should bring our
> >concerns to the people who just might actually do something about it.
>
> As I stated before, write up a well written essay on the subject, send it
> to Smedley, and hope he does something about it. That's the only
realistic
> way to get his attention.
>
> I finally played with my pet last night, and have to say that in a party
> situation it's pretty useless. When fighting in a party we tend to go
> after yellows a lot more, but most yellows will smack my pet in three
> blows, so I end up tanking for my pet!
>
> Brian
>
>
